issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
1. Current documentation validator considers "type" fiels for "properties" on "events" as optional.
Information about types must be always provided in documentation.

2. Validator does not allow "property" on "event" to be optional. Actually in the SDK they could be missing (for [example|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/bf8a6bfd3ca17d3389cb6c8fc775886638226093/android/modules/ui/src/java/ti/modules/titanium/ui/widget/TiUIImageView.java#L520]: "image" property on event "error" for "Titanium.UI.ImageView" on Android)
